name: Project: Don't Fall
description:
Rules are simple : Don't Fall!

Don't Fall into the Death Zone :

Beware of Blocs :

Go to the Flag :

Mouvements :

- Right (Arrow) : Move To Right

- Left (Arrow) : Move To Left

- Space : Jump

- R : Restart Scene

- ESC : Pause Menu

Enjoy ;)

Download : https://app.mediafire.com/6rchbq3u1h0az

Discord (English / French) : https://discord.gg/BCgbTJ4X

GitHub : https://github.com/VaxThrash/Project_Don_t_Fall
